trans-unit.source: The <see cref="N:System.Data.Sql" /> namespace contains classes that support SQL Server-specific functionality.
trans-unit.target: O namespace <see cref="N:System.Data.Sql" /> contém classes que oferecem suporte à funcionalidade específica do SQL Server.

trans-unit.source: For information about the functionality that the classes within this namespace support, see [Enumerating Instances of SQL Server (ADO.NET)](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/enumerating-instances-of-sql-server.md) and [Query Notifications in SQL Server](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/query-notifications-in-sql-server.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações sobre a funcionalidade que as classes neste namespace de suportam, consulte [ao enumerar instâncias do SQL Server (ADO.NET)](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/enumerating-instances-of-sql-server.md) e [notificações de consulta no SQL Server](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/query-notifications-in-sql-server.md).

trans-unit.source: In beta releases of ADO.NET version 2.0, the <xref:System.Data.Sql> namespace also contained classes for use with SQL Server common language runtime (CLR) integration.
trans-unit.target: Nas versões beta do ADO.NET versão 2.0, o <xref:System.Data.Sql> namespace contidas também classes para uso com a integração do SQL Server common language runtime (CLR).

trans-unit.source: However, those classes have been moved into their own namespace, <xref:Microsoft.SqlServer.Server>.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, essas classes foram movidas para o seu próprio namespace <xref:Microsoft.SqlServer.Server>.

trans-unit.source: For more information about using SQL Server CLR integration, see [SQL Server Common Language Runtime Integration](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/sql-server-common-language-runtime-integration.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como usar a integração CLR do SQL Server, consulte [integração Common Language Runtime do SQL Server](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/sql-server-common-language-runtime-integration.md).
